title: Strengthening Instructional Design Competencies: Medical Simulation-Based Leadership Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of basic medical education and hospital management experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Achieve crisis management competency with over 80% accuracy in a medical simulation environment
Apply at least two skills acquired during three months of on-the-job performance after simulation training
Demonstrate communication and leadership skills with over 90% participation in team-based simulation scenarios
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
